title: THE TWIDDLERS 10 Boxes of Colouring Pencils, 12 Pencils Per Box, 120 Total - 18cm Full Length Multipack Drawing Set School Supplies, Party Favours, Artist Sketching Pencils for Kids & Adults
features: 10 Packs of 12: Our multipack colouring pencils for children contain 10 sets of 12 pre-sharpened colouring pencils for kids in individual coloured boxes - the perfect school pencil set pack!

Wide Selection: Our 10 colouring pencil packs feature a wide range of colours, including Black, Bright Red, Dark Blue, Green, Light Blue, Yellow, Orange, Pink, Purple, Sky Blue, True Blue, and Grey, to give kids of all ages more creative freedom.

Premium Quality: Our 10 pack coloured pencils for school are 18cm in length, round in shape, and have coloured barrels matching the pencil colour, making our kids colouring pencils packs comfortable and easy to use by younger hands.

Versatile Colour Pencils for Kids: Perfect for small groups, parties & colouring pencils for party bags, or art clubs, with 10 individual packs of colouring pencils that can easily be bundled with other goodies.

Giveaway Coloured Pencils Multipack: Our children's colouring pencils multipack provides great value for money and a personalised touch with individual coloured boxes, making it an ideal gift for kids who love art and creativity.

Peace of Mind: We’re sure you’ll be pleased with our coloured pencils for children, which is why our childrens colouring pencils are 100% guaranteed. If you have any issues with your pencils for school, let us know and we will be happy to help.
description: Product Description Classroom uses Perfect for school projects that includes variety of art and craft activities such as drawing and colouring. Our multi-packs are made for class sizes Perfect for travel Mess-free activity that can be done anywhere, whether it's on a plane, train, or in a car. Ideal for travel as they are easy to carry around. Party bag filler Provide a fun and engaging activity that can keep children occupied and entertained, especially during parties or other social events. Home activity Offer a fun and creative home activity for children and parent. They can help improve focus, relieve stress, and foster artistic expression. Premium quality Our premium quality colouring pencils have a smooth and even colour application that produces vibrant and consistent colours. The colours are highly pigmented and it is more intense and vivid than standard colouring pencils. They are comfortable, ergonomic, and non-toxic. Birch wood Our colouring pencils are made of high quality birch wood, which is perfect material for colouring pencils, as it can withstand repeated use without breaking or splintering.
